title: END_TEXT_COMMAND_SET_BLIP_NAME
content:
0xBC38B49BCB83BC9B0xE8E59820// EndTextCommandSetBlipName
void END_TEXT_COMMAND_SET_BLIP_NAME(Blip blip);Parameters:blip: The blip to change the name for.Finalizes a text command started with BEGIN_TEXT_COMMAND_SET_BLIP_NAME, setting the name
of the specified blip.Examples:Lua-- creates a blip called 'Food for me!' at 0.0, 0.0, 0.0
AddTextEntry('MYBLIP', 'Food for ~a~!')

local blip = AddBlipForCoords(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
BeginTextCommandSetBlipName('MYBLIP')
AddTextComponentSubstringPlayerName('me')
EndTextCommandSetBlipName(blip)
codeBlocks:
-- creates a blip called 'Food for me!' at 0.0, 0.0, 0.0
AddTextEntry('MYBLIP', 'Food for ~a~!')

local blip = AddBlipForCoords(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
BeginTextCommandSetBlipName('MYBLIP')
AddTextComponentSubstringPlayerName('me')
EndTextCommandSetBlipName(blip)
